00027 void GLCameraMediator::initialize(GLNotifyEvent& event)
00028 {
00029         //do initialize stuff here
00030         m_mouse_x = event.getMouseEvent().GetX();
00031         m_mouse_y = event.getMouseEvent().GetY();
00032 
00033         //store cam data
00034         old_viewPoint   = m_GLCamera->getViewPoint();
00035         old_viewDir     = m_GLCamera->getViewDir();
00036         old_rightVector = m_GLCamera->getRightVector();
00037         old_upVector    = m_GLCamera->getUpVector();
00038         old_rotatedX    = m_GLCamera->getRotatedX();
00039         old_rotatedY    = m_GLCamera->getRotatedY();
00040         old_rotatedZ    = m_GLCamera->getRotatedZ();

00042 
00043         //window size (2D screen)
00044         window_w = event.getWinX();
00045         window_h = event.getWinY();

00052 int GLCameraMediator::translate(GLNotifyEvent& event)
00053 {
00054         //do specific translations on wheel event only
00055         if (event.getMouseEvent().GetWheelRotation())
00056         {
00057                 ZoomIn(event);
00058                 return 0;
00059         }
00060 
00061         //call translation dependend methods
00062         switch (m_Translation)
00063         {
00064         case MOVEXZ:
00065                 MoveXZ(event);
00066                 break;
00067         case MOVEXY:
00068                 MoveXY(event);
00069                 break;
00070         case ROTATEXY:
00071                 RotateXY(event);
00072                 break;
00073         case ROTATEXZ:
00074                 RotateXZ(event);
00075                 break;
00076         default:
00077                 MoveXZ(event);
00078                 break;
00079         }
00080 
00081         return 0;
00082 }
